about_the_game:
[can only be used in-game]
Provide 36 different styles of music package for players to change the background music, the number of songs 300+, players can use the scene circuit to load these music as the game background music, detailed loading methods, see the introduction of the use of the scene circuit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
